name: Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank
description: It is worth noting that this Oxygen Container takes 65 Oxite to fill at a Oxite Dissolver , and will last significantly longer than an Oxygen Bladder , making it one of the most valuable early game purchases in the Workshop . Will remain filled between Prospects. It holds 6500 oxygen units making it useful for stockpile missions that require oxygen delivery.
